name: ORBIDRONE
description:
In a distant galaxy, a small moon - originally meant for mining and asteroid defense - now turned into the last stronghold for humanity in the OMM-23T sector.

What started as a small group of self-replicating and self-enhancing help-and-defend drones turned into a large, violent, planet-engulfing swarm all because one developer decided that skipping a few test cases would be fine if it meant he had a bit more time to work and that "sweet other feature"...

Unfortunately, those test cases were supposed to ensure that the "helper" bots adhere to the 3 laws of robotics. Now, they see us as trash that needs to be removed.

Life has turned into a frantic Prepare-and-fight cycle as the moon plummets once more towards the swarm of drones surrounding the once peaceful planet.

That Red Zone will be the end of us all....

ORBIDRONE is a survival, resource management, tower-defense game set in the future in a galaxy far, far away. Build and maintain your base. Recharge, repair, recondition or recycle your base parts, and prepare for the red zone because those drones are relentless, and your guns are probably not that good.

Keep the shield up because once your habitat is destroyed, it's tickets...

NOTE: ORBIDRONE is best played in full screen mode
